name: Vampire: Blood Sun - Chapter One
description:
Created for "Vampire Jam" - 2021.

"Among the streets of Mexico City, several seats of vampire power wrestle for control. Can you unravel the web of lies and deceit and emerge unscathed?"

In this first chapter of Vampire: Blood Sun, you take control of a group of four helpless saps thrown into the middle of a city- wide conspiracy. Your party must overcome engaging battles in classic JRPG fashion to attempt to see who the man (or woman?) behind the curtain is.

- Flexible Roles! Every member of your party can tank, melee, or cast spells. It is up to you to craft the optimal party for your adventure.

- Vampiric Powers! Over 50 Powers spread over 9 unique Disciplines for you to explore.

- Classic RPG combat! Develop a strategy and Dominate (get it?) your opponent with Powers, Melee, or Firearms.
